ack.p: We are grateful to Dr. Tomomi Ota and the staff of the Chest Medical Unit of Sanpya Hospital, Pyinmana General Hospital, Yankin Children Hospital for sample collection, for the management of the study. We thank Niigata University staff, Mrs. Akemi Watanabe for laboratory assistance, Ms. Saori Nedachi and Ms. Yukie Maruyama for secretarial support and Dr. Yugo Shobugawa for study planning. We also thank Dr. Nobuhiro Takemae in the Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry and Fisheries in Japan for contribution to the analysis, and Drs. Nobuo Nagata, Isamu Sato, Takashi Kawashima, Toshihiro Tanaka, Satoshi Aoki, Naoki, Kodo, Hironori Masaki, Norichika Asoh, Yoshiko Tsuchihashi, Yutaka Shirahige, and Hirotsune Hamabata for collecting influenza viruses in Japan. We would like to thank Editage ( www.editage.com) for English language editing.
